item.title: A list of Brazilian projects
item.description: Every developer, at least once, must have come across awesome lists calls. These lists try to bring together in one place projects related to a theme or libraries for which they were developed. Some examples of these lists are: awesome-java awesome-python vertx-awesome awesome-javascript awesome-go There are several other lists of this type, just search on GitHub and you will probably find one related to the topic you want. See several lists here.
